resources.string: Zonos-Net
The Future Of Our Tomorrow
When & Where
Welcome to the League Of Legends 2017 Tournament! This year we will be having over 30 teams playing at out biggest event yet in the UK!
Here in this app you\'ll be able to find all the big teams that are playing, when they are due to play and as well location and booking any last minute tickets!

Both this app and event is running under League of Legends however fortunate enough to be partnered up with Zonos Networks as its sponsor. They will be having charity games, quizzes and all sorts out of activities running throughout the times there are no matches being played.
Make sure to check their official site at ITsecurity.Org where they offer cyber security expertise!
Highlights At Our Event
The 2017 League of Legends World Championship, more commonly called Worlds, is an international esports event takes place over five weeks of competitive play with 16 top teams.
Who is participating at Worlds 2017?
Hereâ€™s the breakdown of the regions with teams competing at Worlds 2017 and how many spots each region gets:
\u2022 North America - NA League Championship Series (NA LCS) - 3 seeds
\u2022 Europe - EU League Championship Series (EU LCS) - 3 seeds
\u2022 Korea - League of Legends Champions Korea (LCK) - 3 seeds
\u2022 China - League of Legends Pro League (LPL) - 3 seeds
\u2022 Wildcard regions determined at the International Wildcard Qualifier (IWCQ) - 2 seeds
Top teams from LCK, LPL, LMS, NA LCS, and EU LCS receive direct invitations to Worlds 2017, while squads from Wildcard regions qualify via an International Wildcard Qualifier.
What Are They Playing For?

In addition to international pride and glory, teams are competing for the chance to be the 2016 World Champions, the Summoner\'s Cup, and a prize pool of over $2,000,000 USD. Teams will earn prize money based on their finish in the event.

Making sure the event location is in a convenient location which was accessible from all parts of the country and was well known was a priority for us. Because of this we decided to place the event in the city of London.
The worlds tournament will take place on the 1st Of July 2017 in the famous 02 Arena central London & finish on the 4th Of July.
The event will consist of 7 games per day taking a total of 9 hours each day.
During the 4 days, in-between games there will be various activities ranging from charity games to autographs from professiona players!
Please Do Not Forget To Book Your Tickets

To be able to book for this event and guarantee you are able to reserve some seats. You must book tickets, to do so you will only have to visit the Contact Us page and decide by either emailing calling or sending an SMS with your details and the quantity of tickets you would like to purchase. From there we will contact you back at our expense.
Make Sure To Book Now!

For this event it is essential for you to contact us if you are thinking about reserving any tickets. This is a very popular event with only 10,000 tickets to be given out, and works only a first come first serve basis.

To be able to guarantee reservation of ticket you must email us to let us know of your coming alternatively if you have any more questions would like to speak to a member of staff you can call us too:
